main-stack.title: Main stack
main-stack.description: Angular 2-14 SPA/PWA project. Scalable and well organized, could be done with NX monorepo approach

styling.title: Styling
styling.description: CSS3/SCSS/PostCSS in combination with UI libs: Material UI, PrimeNg, Kendo, EaNG, Ngx-bootstrap

patterns.title: Patterns
patterns.description: Project architecture may be based on or elegantly cooperate with the next patterns: OOP, reactive programming based on RxJS operators, functional programming

uikit.title: Uikit
uikit.description: Update your docs and UiKit with Storybook + JsDoc + Compodoc

tests.title: Tests
tests.description: Advanced unit testing using Jest framework. Integкation and e2e testing using Jasmine and Cypress

state-management.title: State management
state-management.description: Wrap your events architecture based on the Redux pattern and used the most popular implementation of it - NGRX

libs.title: Libs
libs.description: ag-Grid, Husky, Fullcalendar, Highcharts, Moment.js/Date-fns, Lodash, Quill. Frameworks: ReactJs, NestJs and Ionic3+ usage on basic/intermediate level

communication-work.title: Communication & Work
communication-work.description: Jira + Confluence, Skype, Slack, Discord, Microsoft Teams. Agile: Kanban & Scrum methodologies, ADRs, road maps, pair programming
